divs: Sighting DetailsI was watching with my wife the passing of the iss. I had this feeling that I should turn around, when I did I saw the triangle, about six block due north and 150 feet up heading due east. Got to see it for about 2 mins then headed north lost sight. This thing was about just over the Ike expressway. NO NOISE at all just glided along. I just got a kick out of seeing it always wanted to see one. "J"
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Forest Park
There were no other sightings in Forest Park on or around August 25th 2010
Summary: Black triangle with lights on corners and red light on bottom.
